Version 2.0.91 - Fix Storyline Resume + Remaining parseInt Issues

Bug Fixes

  • Fix Storyline resume going to previous slide instead of furthest: compute furthestSlide before immediate wrapScormApi so pre-init backing store modification fires
  • Fix Storyline off-by-one: add +1 to extractSlideFromParsedData for 0-based Storyline resume formats (consistent with extractSlideFromText)
  • Fix iSpring/Rise 360 furthest computation: use parseSlideNumber instead of parseInt in computeFurthestFromApi and initial retry loop
  • Fix iSpring/Rise 360 lesson_location boost: use parseSlideNumber so DB value is boosted to furthest for text-format locations

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.90: Fix position bar counter for iSpring/Rise 360 (parseSlideNumber in step 6A) and Captivate (isApiWrite bypass)
  • v2.0.89: Refactor SCORM logs: remove ~300 verbose logs, add 12 targeted position-tracking logs
  • v2.0.88: Fix stale localStorage causing wrong position counter
  • v2.0.87: Enforce 8-flow behavior for all SCORM vendors; fix tag navigation progress inflation and resume position bar drop
